solution_line_template: With the sick children who stayed home, there are this many kindergarten students in the class: {normal_class_size} - {sick_children} = <<{normal_class_size}-{sick_children}={children_present}>>{children_present} kids.
This many jellybeans are eaten: {children_present} x {jellybeans_per_child} = <<{children_present}*{jellybeans_per_child}={jellybeans_eaten}>>{jellybeans_eaten} jellybeans.

This many jellybeans are still left in the jar: {total_jellybeans_initial} - {jellybeans_eaten} = <<{total_jellybeans_initial}-{jellybeans_eaten}={jellybeans_remaining}>>{jellybeans_remaining} jellybeans.
